entry.title: Personalized Ballerina Doll Backpack
entry.s:type: Apparel & Accessories Clothing Accessories Baby & Toddler Clothing Accessories > Personalized Infant & Toddler Backpacks
entry.summary:
Vendor: Leya Doll
Type: Apparel & Accessories Clothing Accessories Baby & Toddler Clothing Accessories > Personalized Infant & Toddler Backpacks
Price: 36.99

Buy any 2 items get 20% off. Personalize her own dollies now!

Personalized Leyadoll Doll Backpack (Ballerina) - 2 Skin Tones Available

Kindly Reminder for Doll Backpack Series:
1. The Doll is a detachable attachment to this backpack, NO NEED to purchase a separated doll.
2. The size of Backpack Dolly is a little bit smaller than the original Leya Dolls. 
3. ATTENTION: For Ballerina Leyadoll, the name can only be added to the hair due to the material of the dress.  

.

Gloveleya Doll Backpack, also known as “Spring Girl”, is every baby’s dream backpack to have. With spring girl’s signature smile, colorful and ultra-soft features, it is without question this is the perfect backpack for your baby to carry outside and inside.  

Craft

The size of the backpack is 9*7*3 Inches in standing. The loading space in backward is 9*7*3 Inches and the space of frontal is 7*7*0.6 Inches. The weight of the backpack is only about 7 oz(198g), which is perfect for your kids when going to the zoo, playing at the park, going to kindergarten, traveling and any other outdoor activities all day. 

You can be confident in knowing that we develop our backpack with extremely proper care. During production, we ensure every seam is tight and impeccably stitched with cross-stitching on the inside to withstand your baby’s cute aggression.

Personalized name backpack

One of the best features of our Gloveleya doll backpack is that you have the ability to personalize her! Using up to 12 characters, you can place a name or any inscription to give the doll backpack a unique identity. The material we use for lettering is safe and skin-friendly, just like the rest of the doll’s materials. Even with proper washings, the letters are durable enough to maintain color and sharpness.  

Safety

Our Gloveleya doll backpack is uniquely crafted with high-quality environmental materials for lasting value. We create our backpack out of soft polyester fibers, skin-friendly plush and fill them with high elasticity PP cotton.  With this perfect combination of materials, our backpack has the ability to stay soft and warm while being fluorescent, kneading, and fragrance-free.

As parents, you know very well that kids tend to be messy.  That is why we designed our backpack to be completely washable to save you the hassle. We provided you with everything you need to know about washing care on the backpack’s tag for easy reference.

We know the importance of safety, especially when it comes to your little one. We manufacture Gloveleya doll backpack from the best and safest materials that comply with the applicable safety standards. We have successfully completed numerous safety tests involving compliancy with children's essential health, safety, and environmental requirements. The tests we have passed are US-CPSIA, ASTM F963-16/-17, CA-CCPSA, EU-CE, EN71-1-2-3, and GB6675.1-4.

Kind Reminder: Out of the concern of product safety, we have removed all the pom-poms from the zips. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Shipping

Due to personalized Doll/Backpack require 1-2 business days to be produced, all orders will be dispatched from our warehouse within 3 business days of receipt.
We are proud to offer FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING on all orders, plus paid Express Couriers (DHL, FedEx) as an alternative option.
Estimated date of delivery:
Regions Free Shipping Express Courier
United States 15-25 days 3-7 days
Canada 15-25 days 3-7 days
United Kingdom 10-20 days 3-7 days
Australia 10-20 days 3-7 days
Europe 10-25 days 3-7 days
Rest of World 7-25 days 3-7 days
All shipping times exclude clearance/customs delays. You can visit our tracking order page to track your package anytime.

    Guarantee & Refund

    At leyadoll.com, we expect our customers to be 100% happy with our products. That's why we offer our customers a risk-free ironclad 30-day guarantee. If you don't have a positive experience for any reason, we will do whatever it takes to make sure you are 100% satisfied with your purchase.
    Should you decide you do not want to keep your product, you can return it to us in its original condition and packaging for an exchange or full refund. You have 30 days in which to return your item so you can shop at our site in complete confidence.
    We have 24/7/365 Ticket and Email Support. Please contact us if you need assistance.

entry.title: Personalized Pink Cherry Doll & Backpack Bundle
entry.s:type: Toys & Games > Toys > Dolls, Playsets & Toy Figures > Dolls > Personalized Plush Dolls
entry.summary:
Vendor: Leya Doll
Type: Toys & Games > Toys > Dolls, Playsets & Toy Figures > Dolls > Personalized Plush Dolls
Price: 49.99

Special Bundle For Cherry Lovers!

Purchase Pink Cherry Doll + Backpack Bundle to save extra 20% OFF!

Gloveleya, also known as “Spring Girl”, is every baby’s dream toy to have. With her signature smile, embroidered flower dress, and ultra-soft features, it is without question this is the perfect doll for your baby to cuddle, play and grow up with.  


Materials

Our Gloveleya dolls are uniquely crafted with high-quality environmental materials for lasting value. We create our dolls out of soft polyester fibers, skin-friendly plush and fill them with high elasticity PP cotton.  With this perfect combination of materials, our dolls have the ability to stay soft and warm while being fluorescent, kneading, and fragrance-free.


As parents, you know very well that kids tend to be messy.  That is why we designed our dolls to be completely machine-washable to save you the hassle. We provided you with everything you need to know about washing care on the doll’s tag for easy reference.

Craft

Doll size: 16.5 inches (43cm) in standing height and 8oz (220g) in weight. We strategically designed the doll’s arms and legs to be no bigger than 4cm, which is the perfect size for babies to grab and play with easily.

Backpack size: 9*7*3 Inches in standing. The loading space in backward is 9*7*3 Inches and the space of frontal is 7*7*0.6 Inches. The weight of the backpack is only about 7 oz(198g), which is perfect for your kids when going to the zoo, playing at the park, going to kindergarten, traveling and any other outdoor activities all day. 

You can be confident in knowing that we develop our dolls with extremely proper care. During production, we ensure every seam is tight and impeccably stitched with cross-stitching on the inside to withstand your baby’s cute aggression.


Safety 

We know the importance of safety, especially when it comes to your little one. We manufacture Gloveleya dolls from the best and safest materials that comply with the applicable safety standards. We have successfully completed numerous safety tests involving compliancy with children's essential health, safety, and environmental requirements. The tests we have passed are US-CPSIA, ASTM F963-16/-17, CA-CCPSA, EU-CE, EN71-1-2-3, and GB6675.1-4.
Kind Reminder: Out of the concern of product safety, we have removed all the pom-poms from the zips. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Personalized name dolls & backpacks

One of the best features of our Gloveleya series is that you have the ability to personalize her! Using up to 12 characters, you can place a name or any inscription to give the doll a unique identity. The material we use for lettering is safe and skin-friendly, just like the rest of the doll’s materials. Even with proper machine-washings, the letters are durable enough to maintain color and sharpness.  


Free Gifts Included

Grab your limited time offer now! By purchasing our Gloveleya Spring Girl series, we will personalize your doll by adding your baby’s name completely free. In addition, you will also receive a free delicate Gift Bag, which makes our doll a perfect gift sent to anyone on any occasion!


There is nothing like that special connection between a baby and their first plush toy. We made this doll with the best quality materials while meeting the highest quality standards.  Designed specially to create lasting memories, you will be glad you purchased a Gloveleya doll for your little one.

Shipping & Delivery

Due to personalized Doll/Backpack require 1-2 business days to be produced, all orders will be dispatched from our warehouse within 3 business days of receipt.
We are proud to offer FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING on all orders, plus paid Express Couriers (DHL, FedEx) as an alternative option.

All shipping times exclude clearance/customs delays. You can visit our tracking order page to track your package anytime.

entry.title: Leyadoll Headband Set - Handmade Baby Girl Headbands and Bows 3PCS
entry.s:type: Apparel & Accessories Clothing Accessories Baby & Toddler Clothing Accessories
entry.summary:
Vendor: Leya Doll
Type: Apparel & Accessories Clothing Accessories Baby & Toddler Clothing Accessories
Price: 11.99

(Attention: in order to offer our customers free shipping service, the headband set is NOT to be sold SEPARATELY. Please add other items to Cart and Checkout. And the headband is not involved in "buy 2 get 20% off", since it is available at a discount. Thank you for your understanding.)

Leyadoll is proudly introducing our original handmade accessories - Baby Girl Headbands and Bows 3PCS Set. Leyadoll Headbands are essential baby clothing accessories, a thoughtful baby shower gift, and a practical and stylish baby registry item.

IDEAL ACCESSORY FOR NEWBORN PHOTOGRAPHY - Our cute, trendy, and unique patterns and bows are the perfect hair accessory for your newborn photos. 

VARIETY OF STYLES - 3 different styles, colors, patterns included matching any outfit. The assortment of beautiful newborn hair bows includes Cotton Floral, Sakker, Silk Satin

SOFT, STRETCHY, COMFORTABLE, EASY TO USE - Each hairband is handmade with high-quality nylon fabric that is soft to the touch and elastic. The stretchy, nude bands can be hand-stretched to fit an infant's head all the way up to toddler girls. Babies don't even feel that the headband is there!

 

ADJUSTABLE TO GROW WITH YOUR BABY - "One size fits all"! Our bands can be hand stretched to best fit your child's head. The headbands are initially about 12-16 inches in circumference, small enough so that they won't slip off your little newborn's head. To prevent marks from forming on your growing baby's forehead, you can hand stretch the hairband to perfectly fit your baby!

  • Material: organic cotton, satin, seersucker, polyester
  • Suitable age: Newborns to 3+ year olds
  • Size: 12-16 inches, adjustable.
  • Weight: 0.35oz/10g for each, 1.05oz/30g for the set excluding packing. 
  • Hand wash only

Our Gloveleya dolls are uniquely crafted with high-quality environmental materials for lasting value. We create our dolls out of soft polyester fibers, skin-friendly plush and fill them with high elasticity PP cotton.  With this perfect combination of materials, our dolls have the ability to stay soft and warm while being fluorescent, kneading, and fragrance-free.

As parents, you know very well that kids tend to be messy.  That is why we designed our dolls to be completely machine-washable to save you the hassle. We provided you with everything you need to know about washing care on the doll’s tag for easy reference.

Craft

Doll size: 16.5 inches (43cm) in standing height and 8oz (220g) in weight. We strategically designed the doll’s arms and legs to be no bigger than 4cm, which is the perfect size for babies to grab and play with easily.

Backpack size: 9*7*3 Inches in standing. The loading space in backward is 9*7*3 Inches and the space of frontal is 7*7*0.6 Inches. The weight of the backpack is only about 7 oz(198g), which is perfect for your kids when going to the zoo, playing at the park, going to kindergarten, traveling and any other outdoor activities all day. 

You can be confident in knowing that we develop our dolls with extremely proper care. During production, we ensure every seam is tight and impeccably stitched with cross-stitching on the inside to withstand your baby’s cute aggression.


Safety 

We know the importance of safety, especially when it comes to your little one. We manufacture Gloveleya dolls from the best and safest materials that comply with the applicable safety standards. We have successfully completed numerous safety tests involving compliancy with children's essential health, safety, and environmental requirements. The tests we have passed are US-CPSIA, ASTM F963-16/-17, CA-CCPSA, EU-CE, EN71-1-2-3, and GB6675.1-4.
Kind Reminder: Out of the concern of product safety, we have removed all the pom-poms from the zips. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Personalized name dolls & backpacks

One of the best features of our Gloveleya series is that you have the ability to personalize her! Using up to 12 characters, you can place a name or any inscription to give the doll a unique identity. The material we use for lettering is safe and skin-friendly, just like the rest of the doll’s materials. Even with proper machine-washings, the letters are durable enough to maintain color and sharpness.  

Free Gifts Included

Grab your limited time offer now! By purchasing our Gloveleya Spring Girl series, we will personalize your doll by adding your baby’s name completely free. In addition, you will also receive a free delicate Gift Bag, which makes our doll a perfect gift sent to anyone on any occasion!


There is nothing like that special connection between a baby and their first plush toy. We made this doll with the best quality materials while meeting the highest quality standards.  Designed specially to create lasting memories, you will be glad you purchased a Gloveleya doll for your little one.

Shipping & Delivery

Due to personalized Doll/Backpack require 1-2 business days to be produced, all orders will be dispatched from our warehouse within 3 business days of receipt.
We are proud to offer FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING on all orders, plus paid Express Couriers (DHL, FedEx) as an alternative option.

Regions Free Shipping Express Courier
United States 9-17 days 3-7 days
Canada 9-17 days 3-7 days
United Kingdom 10-20 days 3-7 days
Australia 10-20 days 3-7 days
Europe 10-25 days 3-7 days
Rest of World 7-25 days 3-7 days
All shipping times exclude clearance/customs delays. You can visit our tracking order page to track your package anytime.

entry.title: Personalized Pink Backpack
entry.s:type: Apparel & Accessories Clothing Accessories Baby & Toddler Clothing Accessories > Personalized Infant & Toddler Backpacks
entry.summary:
Vendor: Leya Doll
Type: Apparel & Accessories Clothing Accessories Baby & Toddler Clothing Accessories > Personalized Infant & Toddler Backpacks
Price: 29.99


Gloveleya Backpack, also known as “Spring Girl”, is every baby’s dream backpack to have. With spring girl’s signature smile, colorful and ultra-soft features, it is without question this is the perfect backpack for your baby to carry outside and inside.  

Materials

Our Gloveleya backpack is uniquely crafted with high-quality environmental materials for lasting value. We create our backpack out of soft polyester fibers, skin-friendly plush and fill them with high elasticity PP cotton. With this perfect combination of materials, our backpack has the ability to stay soft and warm while being fluorescent, kneading, and fragrance-free.

As parents, you know very well that kids tend to be messy.  That is why we designed our backpack to be completely machine-washable to save you the hassle. We provided you with everything you need to know about washing care on the backpack’s tag for easy reference.

Craft

The size of the backpack is 9*7*3 Inches in standing. The loading space in backward is 9*7*3 Inches and the space of frontal is 7*7*0.6 Inches. The weight of the backpack is only about 7 oz(198g), which is perfect for your kids when going to the zoo, playing at the park, going to kindergarten, traveling and any other outdoor activities all day. 

You can be confident in knowing that we develop our backpack with extremely proper care. During production, we ensure every seam is tight and impeccably stitched with cross-stitching on the inside to withstand your baby’s cute aggression.

Safety

We know the importance of safety, especially when it comes to your little one. We manufacture Gloveleya backpack from the best and safest materials that comply with the applicable safety standards. We have successfully completed numerous safety tests involving compliancy with children's essential health, safety, and environmental requirements. The tests we have passed are US-CPSIA, ASTM F963-16/-17, CA-CCPSA, EU-CE, EN71-1-2-3, and GB6675.1-4.

Kind Reminder: Out of the concern of product safety, we have removed all the pom-poms from the zips. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Personalized name backpack

One of the best features of our Gloveleya backpack is that you have the ability to personalize her! Using up to 12 characters, you can place a name or any inscription to give the backpack a unique identity. The material we use for lettering is safe and skin-friendly, just like the rest of the doll’s materials. Even with proper machine-washings, the letters are durable enough to maintain color and sharpness.  

Shipping & Delivery

Due to personalized Doll/Backpack require 1-2 business days to be produced, all orders will be dispatched from our warehouse within 3 business days of receipt.
We are proud to offer FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING on all orders, plus paid Express Couriers (DHL, FedEx) as an alternative option.

United States 15-25 days 3-7 days
Canada 15-25 days 3-7 days
United Kingdom 10-20 days 3-7 days
Australia 10-20 days 3-7 days
Europe 10-25 days 3-7 days
Rest of World 7-25 days 3-7 days
All shipping times exclude clearance/customs delays. You can visit our tracking order page to track your package anytime.

    At leyadoll.com, we expect our customers to be 100% happy with our products. That's why we offer our customers a risk-free ironclad 30-day guarantee. If you don't have a positive experience for any reason, we will do whatever it takes to make sure you are 100% satisfied with your purchase.
    Should you decide you do not want to keep your product, you can return it to us in its original condition and packaging for an exchange or full refund. You have 30 days in which to return your item so you can shop at our site in complete confidence.
